verbs.description: rough day for stocks [ARGM-MNR: scary] [V: warning] [ARG1: on housing] it shaping up to be a bleak day on wall street with the dow falling more than 400 points at the open the s&p 500 and nasdaq were in similar straits the wall street journal chalks up the declines to lousy earnings reports from blue chips caterpillar and 3 m along saudi arabia clarity financial tricking us jesse colombo the wall street journal clarity financial china jamal khashoggi
